title: Navigating to the Homepage
objective: the user can navigate to the homepage successfully

title: Navigating to the PLP from the Global Navigation Menu
objective: the user can navigate to the PLP from global navigation

title: Navigating to the PLP from the Homepage Image
objective: the user can navigate to the PLP from the corresponding homepage image

title: Navigating to the PLP from the Homepage Shop Now Button
objective: the user can navigate to the PLP from the corresponding Shop Now button on the homepage

title: Navigating to the PLP from the PDP
objective: the user can navigate to the PLP from a PDP

title: Navigating to the PDP from a PLP
objective: the user can access the PDP from a PLP

title: Navigating to the PDP from the Cart Using Product Image
objective: the user can navigate to the PDP from the cart using the product image of an item in the cart

title: Navigating to the PDP from the Cart Using Product Description
objective: the user can navigate to the PDP from the cart using the description of an item in the cart

title: Navigating to the Cart from Elsewhere on the Site
objective: the user can access the cart from elsewhere on the site

title: Navigating to Checkout from the Cart
objective: the user can access the checkout page from the cart

title: Navigating to Checkout After Adding an Item to the Cart
objective: the user can access checkout after adding an item to the cart

title: Navigating to the Cart After Adding an Item to the Cart
objective: the user can access the cart after adding an item to the cart
